Description: Lower body sherd of Chian, possibly early patterned, pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with two pairs of added white bands; exterior reserved with brown band on cul; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 20.12)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0261) (phase 2)
